pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, March 26, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Winnipeg, Manitoba

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will tour the Manitoba Institute of Trades and Technology, and make a skills and training announcement to highlight Budget 2019’s Canada Training Benefit. A media availability will follow. Minister of International Trade Diversification Jim Carr will be in attendance.

Manitoba Institute of Trades and Technology
130 Henlow Bay

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity of the tour
  • Open coverage for the announcement and media availability
  • Media are asked to arrive by the east doors no later than 8:15 a.m.     

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of International Trade Diversification Jim Carr will meet with Chief Executive Officer and President of James Richardson & Sons, Limited Hartley Richardson, and Chief Executive Officer and President of Richardson International Limited Curt Vossen.

Closed to media.

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Manitoba Federation of Labour, and deliver brief remarks to highlight Budget 2019’s Canada Training Benefit. Minister of International Trade Diversification Jim Carr will be in attendance.

Manitoba Federation of Labour
303-275 Broadway

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:30 a.m.

Media appearances

8:10 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CKJS AM 810, Good Morning Philippines.

4:05 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CBC Radio One Manitoba, Up to Speed.

4:40 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on ICI Radio-Canada Première, L’actuel.
